article_node.title: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller Sold His Entire Stake in Palantir and Has, Once Again, Started Loading Up on This Trillion-Dollar Artificial Intelligence (AI) Stock
article_node.summary: Billionaire Stanley Druckenmiller liquidated his entire Palantir stake, citing profit‑taking and an over‑valued P/S ratio, while adding a significant position in Broadcom, a key AI‑networking supplier. The move follows a 13F filing that shows Druckenmiller’s short average holding period of under seven months and a focus on high‑growth AI infrastructure. Broadcom’s AI‑chip and networking solutions, coupled with early‑April tariff‑related market volatility, provide a catalyst for the new position. The trade underscores a pivot from speculative AI‑software to more established AI‑hardware exposure amid valuation concerns for Palantir.
